programme.title: Weatherman Walking
programme.sub-title: Weatherman Walking: Dylans Walks - New Quay and Laugharne
programme.desc: Derek Brockway presents the second of two specials originally shown to celebrate the centenary of Dylan Thomass birth. First he travels to the seaside town of New Quay on Cardigan Bay, where the poet and writer lived with wife Caitlin during the Second World War. Jeff Towns, chairman of the Dylan Thomas Society, joins Derek to explain how Thomas was inspired to write some of his greatest work during this era. For his final walk, to Laugharne, the presenter is accompanied by Thomass grandaughter Hannah Ellis, who reveals the significance of the town to both her grandparents and her family today

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Robbie Cumming tackles the fast-flowing River Trent and is invited to join a night-time illuminated boat parade. However, his journey is hampered by a damaged wall in Worksop and a water shortage on the Chesterfield Canal which threatens his voyage

programme.title: Vasa: The Ghost Ship
programme.desc: Following the work of archaeologists, divers and historians as they make new discoveries about the Vasa, a Swedish Navy flagship that was built in 1628, the height of Swedens military expansion. On its maiden voyage, the ship sank in Stockholm harbour and remained there for more than 300 years, until its discovery in 1961

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Homicidal madman Michael Myers escapes from a mental institution 15 years after murdering his sister, and goes on a killing spree in his home town. Although a psychiatrist is quickly on his trail in a bid to stop the loss of more lives, a shy teenage girl babysitting for her neighbour is unaware of the grisly fate in store for her. John Carpenters horror, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Donald Pleasence, Nick Castle and PJ Soles

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: A woman awaits the return of her husband from the Second World War while struggling to care for her son and daughter. Both children suffer a violent reaction when exposed to daylight, forcing her to keep much of their isolated home on the island of Jersey shrouded in gloom. When the pair claim to see strangers in the house, their terrified mother begins to suspect that the souls of the dead are stalking the halls. Period supernatural thriller, starring Nicole Kidman, Fionnula Flanagan, Alakina Mann, James Bentley and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Hauntings
programme.desc: A look at stories surrounding the ghost of 17th-century Edinburgh executioner George Mackenzie that sprung up in 1998 after a homeless man broke into his tomb and fell into an assembly of decomposing corpses. Within weeks, stories of blackouts and inexplicable attacks began to spread, with Edinburgh City Council locking the gates and declaring the area out of bounds for public safety. Jan Andrew Henderson began to chronicle the Mackenzie Poltergeist - only to claim to become a target of its malice

programme.title: Hauntings
programme.desc: A look at a 1958 case in which two women travelled together to a nightclub near Lake Lanier in the US state Georgia, but never returned. Weeks later, reports began of a ghostly figure of woman in a blue dress walking across the lake, while calls for help were heard from the water below, before stories of unexplained drownings emerged. Mysterious deaths at Lake Lanier abound, whilst survivors report the feeling of being pulled into the depths or held beneath by unseen hands.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking
programme.sub-title: Weatherman Walking: Dylans Walks - New Quay and Laugharne
programme.desc: Derek Brockway presents the second of two specials originally shown to celebrate the centenary of Dylan Thomass birth. Jeff Towns, chairman of the Dylan Thomas Society, joins Derek to explain how Thomas was inspired to write some of his greatest work during this era. For his final walk, to Laugharne, the presenter is accompanied by Thomass grandaughter Hannah Ellis, who reveals the significance of the town to both her grandparents and her family today

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Kate Thornton presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 4 September 1998. Featuring Boyzone, Steps, Mansun, Honeyz, Faithless, The Corrs, Madonna and Manic Street Preachers

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jamie Theakston presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 11 September 1998. Featuring Five, Jennifer Paige, Sheryl Crow, Manic Street Preachers, Aerosmith, Hole and All Saints

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Simon Bates introduces performances by Raw Silk, Blue Zoo, Culture Club, Dionne Warwick, Melba Moore, Tears for Fears and Eddy Grant. Plus, video footage of the Beatles. Originally broadcast on October 28

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Tony Blackburn presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 28 October 1976. Featuring Alan Price, Chicago, Leo Sayer, Joan Armatrading, Simon May, Pussycat and a Legs and Co dance routine

programme.title: Bruce Springsteen at the BBC
programme.desc: A selection of performances from the BBCs archives by the American singer-songwriter. Featuring a look at his early days, appearances on The Old Grey Whistle Test and Top of the Pops, as well as his glory days in the 1980s

programme.title: When Bruce Springsteen Came to Britain
programme.desc: A look at the American singer-songwriters unique relationship with the UK, telling the story of his first European gig, when he and his E Street Band arrived for a sold-out performance at Londons Hammersmith Odeon in November 1975 to promote his Born to Run album. In an interview recorded for this programme, Springsteen reveals how he was so disappointed by his own performance that night that he couldnt watch the footage back for more than 30 years, while fans recount how hearing - and meeting - Springsteen changed their lives

programme.title: Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band: Hammersmith Odeon 1975
programme.desc: The singer-songwriter and his bands first European concert, featuring performances of Thunder Road, Shes the One, Born to Run, Rosalita (Come Out Tonight) and Quarter to Three. First broadcast 19 May 2006

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Kate Thornton presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 4 September 1998. Featuring Boyzone, Steps, Mansun, Honeyz, Faithless, The Corrs, Madonna and Manic Street Preachers

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Caught
programme.desc: How the search for a vulnerable young woman unravelled a tragic case of neglect and murder. Plus, police investigating the murder of a popular teen found the key suspects very close to home. Narrated by Michelle Ackerley

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: The developer in Kent tackling almost every job imaginable in a mid-terrace. Plus, a flat in south London and a semi-detached property in Birmingham both in need of a new lease of life. Presented by Jacqui Joseph, Dion Dublin and Martin Roberts

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Philip Serrell and Roo Irvine advise two teams hunting antiques in Southwell, Nottinghamshire, before heading to Bishton Hall in Staffordshire for the days auction. Host Christina Trevanion monitors events and also discovers the origins of the popular Bramley apple

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: Tracker Richard is hoping to find two stolen diggers in two different parts of the country - in a single day. He quickly finds the first one abandoned in a water treatment plant near Stafford. The second is more difficult to find - its been driven through a hedge and is half-buried in woods just outside Manchester. Motoring enthusiast Richard has his BMW stolen from outside his flat in Solihull. Thankfully its fitted with a tracker, and recovery specialist Joe is quickly on the case. He traces the vehicle to a car park just two miles from where it was taken

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: The expert teams are out in Lake District, as the free divers confront a difficult underwater search for irreplaceable memories locked inside a lost phone. The scuba divers tackle training deep under water and crafter Dave Turner tries to make dumped scrap metal into a desirable object once again. Presented by Helen Skelton

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Nicki Chapman makes the shows first trip to the Channel Islands, helping a couple with three children to find a family home and meeting a herd of Guernseys famous cows

programme.title: The Repair Shop on the Road
programme.sub-title: Yorkshire - Crumbling York Minster Gets Rescued
programme.desc: York Minster is one of the our most magnificent cathedrals, boasting the worlds largest expanse of medieval stained glass. However, the stonework of this glorious gothic monument is crumbling away on a daily basis. Dominic Chinea and Will Kirk join the new generation of stonemasons being trained to save it, harnessing modern technology while still using centuries-old skills

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret amount, which could be anything from zero to £4,000, before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Phil Wang

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Clara Amfo and Vernon Kay host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: As Halloween night continues, Zoe grows increasingly paranoid that someone is out to get her and accuses Anthony before kicking him out of the Vic. And questions of the past come to the fore as Kat, Zoe and Tommy watch the video from 1988

programme.title: Dragons Den
programme.desc: Two friends from Nottinghamshire look to Peter Jones, Deborah Meaden, Sara Davies, Steven Bartlett and Touker Suleyman to invest in their range of inclusive dancewear. An eye surgeon-turned-inventor hopes the Dragons will see the potential in his clever fix for lost tape ends. Two schoolmates-turned-founders pitch a purpose-driven mobile network, while a Leicester-based entrepreneur unveils an accessibility-focused app. Hosted by Evan Davis

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the game nears the end, the murders become increasingly harder for the traitors. With time running out to increase the final prize pot, the celebrity players take on a mission where one mistake could cause heads to roll. At the round table, the faithful have one final chance to discover the identity of the banished player. Hosted by Claudia Winkleman

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Letters from the Blitz
programme.desc: Documentary drawing upon restored original colour home movies and personal letters to offer a glimpse into life in Northern Ireland during the Second World War. Helen Ramsey Turtle was a young American mother living on an island outside Belfast. Her letters home to America reveal the horror of the Belfast Blitz, the buzz of American GIs arriving and her own deeply personal story of resilience and optimism in the face of an unexpected diagnosis

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce chairs the topical debate from Bradford, the current UK City of Culture, inviting a panel of politicians and other guests to answer questions from an invited audience on subjects that have made the headlines over the past week

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: A panel of BBC journalists hosts a weekly round-up from Westminster, delivering the usual mix of serious analysis and light-hearted gossip about the biggest stories in politics. Laura Kuenssberg, Adam Fleming and Chris Mason are among the regular contributors

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Caught
programme.desc: An incident in which police were staggered by a thief with many disguises who went on to confess far more than they could imagine. Plus, how the net closed in on a gang stealing sentimental jewellery

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion Dublin heads to the seaside town of Mablethorpe in Lincolnshire to see a detached two-bed bungalow thats seen better days. Hes also in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, to see a two-bed semi-detached house bought by two property developing brothers. Just outside Norwich, Jacqui Joseph visits a characterful, Grade II listed cottage.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Couple Ellie and Josie take their expert Irita Marriott on a dash around the stalls to find three profitable items to sell at auction. A vintage enamel sign goes straight on the backburner before they spot an Indian brass model of ox pulling a cart. Meanwhile, antiques specialist John Cameron and couple Pav and Melissa kick off with an old football and rugby ball before deciding that a deal on a Danish bonbon dish just isnt sweet enough for them. While the two teams compete, Natasha Raskin Sharp asks passers-by about an intriguing tool. Its made of two metals, has rotating blades and fits in the palm of the hand

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Hope Street
programme.desc: When an under-prepared Clint collapses during a half-marathon, Port Devines newest police officer - hunky ex-rugby player Donal - carries him over the finish line. Clint needs a doctor, so glamorous GP Sasha hurries over to assist - and the attraction between herself and Donal is instant. However, as the pair help Clint towards Sashas car, the vehicle explodes. It falls to Inspector Eve Dunlop and her team to determine who did it - and why. Tara Lynne ONeill stars in the police drama set in a fictional Northern Irish town

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A health-conscious couple from London enlist Sonali Shah to help them spend £1.3 million on a detached property in Surrey with enough land to create a wellness retreat. Taking a breather from house-hunting, Sonali immerses herself in the countys ancient woodlands as she learns about the Japanese practice of forest bathing

programme.title: The Repair Shop on the Road
programme.sub-title: Dumfries and Galloway - A Book for Lockerbie
programme.desc: Will Kirk and Kirsten Ramsay are in Dumfries and Galloway, where they help with a project to commemorate the victims of the Lockerbie bombing. Will is also joined by new automata expert Michael to tackle a clockwork train that was once the pride and joy of its owners father and Kirsten learns the secrets of medieval slipware pottery from a pair of experts in the nearby village of Corsack

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret amount, which could be anything from zero to £4,000, before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong and Phil Wang co-host the quiz in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: JB Gill and Clara Amfo host the live magazine show featuring a mixture of celebrity chat and stories of interest

programme.title: North Coast Riders
programme.desc: Ethan Hill and Albert have spent the winter tracking a mythical wave - one that only breaks under rare conditions. With the charts finally aligned, they head out in pursuit. Ricky Bell, once one of Irelands boldest climbers, returns to the rock with a challenge hes long held in mind. After years of balancing fatherhood and work, hes ready to test himself again. Meanwhile, Hanno Windisch prepares for a scouting dive. With tourist season still months away, he explores new underwater sites that could sustain his work and passion

programme.title: Return to Paradise
programme.desc: A scientist working at a shark research lab is found dead on a runaway boat. Detective Mackenzie Clarke - aka Mack - suspects the death is a meticulously planned murder. The return of the Death in Paradise spin-off, starring Anna Samson and Lloyd Griffith

programme.title: Leonard and Hungry Paul
programme.desc: Leonard gets positive feedback on his new childrens book proposal. Encouraged, he asks Shelley to go on another date, which doesnt go to plan. Meanwhile, Hungry Paul attends an unusual job interview, hoping to become the new spokesperson for the National Mime Association. Comedy, narrated by Julia Roberts and starring Alex Lawther and Laurie Kynaston

programme.title: Leonard and Hungry Paul
programme.desc: Leonard learns the fate of his book proposal and of his future with Shelley. On the eve of her wedding, Grace feels held back by her responsibility towards her younger brother. Leonard and Hungry Paul attend her wedding as each others plus ones and start a new venture to reintroduce people to silence. Comedy, narrated by Julia Roberts and starring Alex Lawther and Laurie Kynaston

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts, as Labour MP Louise Haigh and comedian Laura Smyth join in the fun on the satirical current affairs quiz alongside regular team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton. As usual, all concerned poke fun at the weeks headlines

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The host is joined by double Oscar nominee Keira Knightley, now turned childrens author with I Love You Just the Same. Plus, female education activist Malala Yousafzai talks about her new memoir Finding My Way, Aimee Lou Wood reflects on her role in BBC comedy series Daddy Issues and comedian Chris McCausland recounts his journey from comic to Strictly winner in Keep Laughing.Theres music from Mumford and Sons with Hozier, who perform their new single Rubber Band Man

programme.title: How Are You? Its Alan (Partridge)
programme.desc: Newly single and never happier, Alan throws himself into new experiences to see if trying fresh things can improve peoples wellbeing - and finds joy in the unexpected. Comedy, starring Steve Coogan, with Felicity Montagu and Tim Key

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The pressure is on as the queens singing, dancing and acting skills are challenged in Peter Pansy - The Rusical. West End musical theatre legend Mazz Murray joins head judge RuPaul, alongside Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel. Later, the curtain comes down on yet another queen

programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A look at how the Second World War played out on the home front, featuring Churchills secret loo, the heroic ATA Girls and German spies being caught out by their delicious sausages

programme.title: The Hit List
programme.desc: Marvin and Rochelle Humes present the music-based quiz show in which contestants must name as many hit songs and artists as possible under intense pressure, with a £10,000 jackpot up for grabs. The contestants are twin sisters Katie and Stacey from Stoke-on-Trent, father and son Peter and Peter from Dundee, and sisters Ivy and Karen from Swansea

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Alan Carr hosts this game show in which three teams of contestants have to identify a board full of images, with a chance of winning up to £10,000 if they know them all. Playing this week are work colleagues from Liverpool, students from Cardiff, and a mother and daughter from Wigan

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The pressure is on as the queens singing, dancing and acting skills are challenged in Peter Pansy - The Rusical. West End musical theatre legend Mazz Murray joins head judge RuPaul, alongside Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel. Later, the curtain comes down on yet another queen

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: A second serial killer adopts the ghost mask and embarks on a campaign of murder, while survivors of the first massacre try to get to the bottom of the terrifying mystery. Wes Cravens horror sequel, starring Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, David Arquette, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jada Pinkett Smith and Jamie Kennedy

programme.title: Paranormal: The Village That Saw Aliens
programme.desc: In 1977, 14 schoolboys from a village in west Wales made headlines around the world after they claimed to see a UFO in the playground. The media frenzy was fuelled by the fact the boys had been placed under exam conditions and asked to draw what they saw. All depicted a large silver craft with eery similarities. However, their close encounter was only the start as it triggered a wave of unexplained phenomena along the coastline. Natural sceptic Sian Eleri delves into reports of the sighting, beginning by tracking down those whose alien encounter triggered what was dubbed the biggest mass UFO sighting in Britain

programme.title: Paranormal: The Village That Saw Aliens
programme.desc: Equipped with a tape of hotelier Rosa claiming she saw a spaceship land and two creatures appear weeks before the primary school sighting in Broad Haven, Sian Eleri heads to the hilltop Haven Fort Hotel Rosa owned to try to track her down. She has to consider the possibility that Rosa invented the story to drum up business

programme.title: Paranormal: The Village That Saw Aliens
programme.desc: Multiple people claimed to have seen a pulsating light around Stack Rocks, so Sian Eleri takes a boat out, determined to see the site for herself. Later, she heads to Oxford University, where astrophysicist Dr Becky Smethurst demonstrates how plasma can be created by nature. For a few moments, the strange UFO sightings across south Wales feel explained, but reality sets in. It doesnt explain the schoolboys seeing the same object in the sky or hotelier Rosas claims of strange figures. Sian is forced to look again at the evidence. Despite her scepticism, recurring details in the accounts are becoming harder to ignore

programme.title: Paranormal: The Village That Saw Aliens
programme.desc: Sian Eleris investigation into the reports of mass UFO sightings that began in a playground in west Wales draws her into unsettling questions around secret military testing, evidence of a craft that defies human capabilities, conspiracy theories and whistleblowers across the Pond. As Sian tracks down some of the hundreds of eyewitnesses from the UFO sighting in January 1983, she makes a startling discovery

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Things change for Zoe when she realises every time she is wolf-whistled she is taken over by a wolf and attacks the culprit. Now, on the beach on a Sunday night over a bank holiday weekend, Zoe and her friend Beth need to figure out how to dispose of a dead body

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Alexandra Palace in north London, venue of the BBCs first ever television broadcast, stages the south of England heat, as comics Blank Peng, Fab Goualin, Sharifa Butterfly, Sydney May and Evaldas Karosas battle it out to book their place in this years grand final showdown. Host Sara Pascoe is joined by stand-up comics Catherine Bohart and Michael Odewale, who appear alongside Fatiha El-Ghorri on the panel of judges

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The pressure is on as the queens singing, dancing and acting skills are challenged in Peter Pansy - The Rusical. West End musical theatre legend Mazz Murray joins head judge RuPaul, alongside Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel. Later, the curtain comes down on yet another queen

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Death, of Stupid Deaths fame, presents his very own show crammed full of spooky highlights. Featuring Sarah Hadland, Steve Punt and Meera Syal

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: In 1967, an orphaned boy goes to live with his grandmother, only to find himself the prey of diabolical witches disguised as glamorous women. Heading to a seaside hotel seems like a great way to escape, but in an unfortunate twist of fate, the worlds Grand High Witch is gathering her coven at the same resort, and has a nefarious plan in store. Co-writer/director Robert Zemeckiss take on the beloved Roald Dahl fantasy, starring Anne Hathaway, Octavia Spencer and Stanley Tucci, and narrated by Chris Rock

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Finglas and everyone is getting into the spooky spirit of things. Agnes is ready for any trick-or-treaters, but instead receives a surprising visitor from her past. As no one else can see her ghostly guest, they think shes gone mad - not even Doctor Flynn can help. Luckily, Father Damien is on hand, and with a little help from Grandad, they get rid of the unwanted guest in time to head down to Foleys for the fancy dress shindig. A special of the comedy recorded live in 2021, written by and starring Brendan OCarroll

programme.title: Inside No 9
programme.desc: The 25th episode of Steve Pemberton and Reece Shearsmiths anthology series is a Halloween special performed and broadcast live in 2018. A man finds an old mobile phone in a graveyard and decides to try and return it to its owner. But no good deed goes unpunished, and his investigation into the mystery leads him into a nightmare of his own making. With Stephanie Cole

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: Three survivors of the original Woodsboro massacre reunite when a killer dons the infamous ghost mask and strikes during the production of a movie based on their experiences. As they try to determine the identity of the murderer, Sidney discovers a troubling link to her past, forcing her to confront her demons once and for all. Horror sequel, starring Neve Campbell, David Arquette and Courteney Cox

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Sian Eleri recounts the story of Helen Duncan, who claimed she could summon the dead. Helen was a Scottish medium, who in 1944 went on trail at the Old Bailey and became the last person convicted and imprisoned under the Witchcraft Act. Sian visits Helens birthplace, Callander, a small town where her childhood premonitions caused fear in the community

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Disturbed by a recording of what appears to be a spirit voice and accounts of the late medium Helen Duncan summoning physical spirit forms, Sian Eleri focuses on evidence from those who believe this apparent seance to be fake. Searching for answers and hoping to understand how Helen was convincing people they were communicating with their dead loved ones, Sian tracks down a modern-day medium. He claims to commune with the other side, but a seance in Edinburgh leaves Sian with more questions than she first started with

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Sian finds a medium in the Netherlands who claims they bring back spirits in physical form. This could be a glimpse into Helens world, but Sians been warned there are dangers. Back in the UK, Sian reads an astonishing account of Helen bringing back a Second World War sailor from the dead in Portsmouth

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Sian discovers an account of a spirit revealing secret information during a seance. This new evidence could prove Helens abilities - or that she was a spy. Either way, it seems the authorities wanted her out of the way because she was seen as a danger

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mobeen Azhars investigation into prison corruption uncovers the murder of a former officer who had been involved in exposing an illicit relationship. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestone
programme.desc: Sian Eleris investigation into the reported haunting of Penyffordd Farm continues as multiple witnesses claim to see a hooded figure. Could they all have imagined the same thing? As she listens to recordings the original investigator made, Sian discovers the Welsh words for disabled and child had allegedly appeared on the walls. Sian meets with one of the Gower daughters to ask whether at the time she believed that to be the monk apparition focusing in one family member

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestone
programme.desc: Unable to meet Rose-Mary or David, Sian Eleri visits an exorcist to find out what he believes removing a spirit from the house would entail. She speaks to the daughters of the couple that owned the house at the height of the haunting to question them one last time and Dr Daniels finds a similar case in Spain that might provide a clue as to how the haunting might have been a hoax

programme.desc: ...Space/Sniffer Sniffler Raccoon/Transformational Bear/Shaken-Up Bear/Piñata Party/Bear Game/Ranger Lemming => The Lemmings have discovered a truly wild new game: an augmented reality program on the rangers digital tablet. / The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment. / The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. / Grizzys last jar of chocolate spread was pinched by the Lemmings who are savoring it in secret. / Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back Grizzy balks at getting up. / The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. / Grizzy finds a piñata in the rangers living room. The idea of breaking a papier-mâche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him. / Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove.

All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them. / Mush-Mush wants to be just like Starmush when he grows up, because he’s convinced that Starmush is the most awesome Mushable there is.

programme.desc: Sally and her husband Tony fell in love with Cyprus 15 years ago. Now, with their children all grown up, theyre ready to take the plunge and buy their dream holiday home. Laura Hamilton shows them five options within their budget of £125,000

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: In Italy, videogame professionals Mike and Jools lean into their hamlets medieval history to create a new game. Lucie and Jerry are determined to revive their borgos olive-farming heritage. Over in western France, Patrick and Mihaela turn to hospitality to rescue their time-worn estate

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The weeks final visit is to East Lothian, where husband and wife Gavin and Rosie host at Cove Farm. Theyre hoping to persuade their guests of the merits of glamping, convincing their guests to embrace the great outdoors with a wood-fired hot tub. However, tensions rise during a trip to a local brewery - and theyre not eased by a complaint about the sleeping situation

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fourth to host in Belfast is 26-year-old accountant Kirsty, whos hoping for rave reviews of her Ibiza-themed evening and favourite dishes. While the evening starts off well with positive comments about the grub and an impromptu club fest, things start to unravel during the main course leaving Kirsty flustered. Can Kirsty pull it together and dance her way to success to bag the grand?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: With retirement - and the Atlantic Ocean - on the horizon, Suzanne and David are looking for their first home together on Portugals central Silver Coast. Named after the stunning shimmer of the Atlantic Ocean, this popular part of Portugal is famous for sun, sea and sand, as well as some beautiful historic towns. Ben Hillman shows Suzanne and David five options for their maximum budget of £240,000, from an underwhelming uphill climb to luscious layouts and lots of land

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: George Clarkes Homes in the Wild
programme.desc: The architect ventures deep into New Zealands Marlborough Sounds, on the edge of one of the wildest and most unforgiving stretches of water in the world. Among the maze of secluded bays and forested ridges, he finds a dangerously remote barn conversion, climbs aboard a replica pirate ship and visits an iconic architecturally designed home

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Little Alex Horne has a lot of fun administering a task involving ducks and mystery. But while that may be his favourite sort of task, its not appreciated by everyone - especially Sanjeev Bhaskar. Ania Magliano makes a noise like a small cat, Maisie Adam becomes smug, Reece Shearsmith balances on one leg for an impressive length of time, while Phil Ellis struggles to open a door as the challenges continue to be dished out by Greg Davies

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: Ramsays Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Anglers Lodge in Island Park, Idaho. Owner Dave Eby built the lodge with his own hands, but a family tragedy has caused him and wife Dede to shy away from the hotel and the community. Gordon is desperate to help mend this broken family - but is it too late to save their business?

programme.title: Skin
programme.desc: A destitute young man, raised by racist skinheads and notorious among white supremacists, turns his back on hatred and violence to transform his life, with the help of a black activist and the woman he loves. Crime drama, starring Jamie Bell, Danielle Macdonald and Daniel Henshall

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head off to Loughborough, Leicestershire, to take on a 1992 Saab 900 Turbo thats in desperate need of repair. The car belongs to Saab enthusiast and former electrical engineer Pravesh. Sadly, due to ill health, Pravesh has been left with little strength to work on the car, so its been left to rot. His family believe getting his Saab back on the road would give him the boost he needs

programme.title: Unreported World
programme.sub-title: Sex, Power, Money: South Africas Slay Queens
programme.desc: How a controversial new generation of young women known as slay queens are monetising South Africas dating culture. Slay queens flaunt luxury lifestyles online funded by wealthy blessers - inspiring both admiration and anger. As Symeon Brown reports, to their followers, theyre glamorous entrepreneurs breaking free from poverty and oppression. To their critics, theyre dangerous gold diggers who blur the lines between dating, sex work - and scams

programme.title: Jamies One-Pan Wonders
programme.desc: Jamie presents more easy and delicious meals all cooked in just one pan, pot or dish. In this episode, he prepares a super-fast, flavour-packed smoky noodle soup, the cleverest home-made bread in a pan and a chicken and mushroom pie with a time-saving tip for perfect pastry

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer go head to head as they meet Nikki and Bash from Birmingham. After living in their three-bed house for 15 years Bash thinks its time for them and their three children to move to a sizeable home in the countryside. While Nikki agrees the house isnt right for them she thinks with the help of Kirstie and their budget of £80-100,000 they can make it work and not have to move away from friends and family. Phil takes his budget of £650,000 and searches for a house that will make them both happy

programme.title: The King of Queens

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug is called to testify as an expert witness for a case Carries working on - but she thinks he is being too light-hearted about it. Meanwhile, Danny and Spence fight over an attractive dog walker. Starring Kevin James and Leah Remini

programme.title: Unreported World
programme.sub-title: Guns and Cocaine: Colombias Narco Wars
programme.desc: After a 2016 peace deal following a 50-year civil war, Colombia has once again become engulfed in violence, as guerrilla groups battle for control of coca fields and lucrative smuggling routes. In the past year alone, more than 50,000 people have been forced from their homes and civilians face the daily threat of killings, forced recruitment and displacement. Guillermo Galdos travels deep into the Catatumbo region to understand the fight for cocaine production and gains rare access to Colombias special forces as they launch operations against guerrilla fighters

programme.desc: Grandma introduces the family to her new boyfriend, but the old curmudgeon quickly upsets everyone with his rude behaviour. Dad cannot stand him and hides in his shed, but nobody is prepared for what happens when the guest suddenly loses his temper. Comedy, starring Simon Bird

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Rosaria bought Bella Luna to realise her son Gianfrancos ambition to become a chef, but the Italian restaurants future looks bleak due to his lack of experience in the kitchen combined with her refusal to acknowledge the eaterys many flaws. Gordon Ramsay heads to Easton, Pennsylvania, to help the troubled pair and save the business from financial disaster

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Gloria, Claire, Haley, Alex, Lily, Luke and Manny find different ways to show support for the womens movement, while a car park causes a major disagreement between Jay and Phil

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch and Jay each seek out a much-needed retreat from domestic life, but end up at the same resort, while Cam feels at a loose end and drops in on Glorias to lend a hand

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three previous restaurants he tried to save, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he heads for West Babylon, New York, where he helped the inexperienced owners of restaurant Classic American deal with their escalating debts, before returning to Davide in Boston, an Italian restaurant run by two warring brothers. Finally, he visits Down City, a restaurant in Providence, Rhode Island, run by hot-headed owner Abby

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon bids an emotional goodbye to Fun with Flags as he and Amy record the final instalment of the internet show. Leonard, Howard and Raj clear out the office of a recently deceased professor and take a peek at his research. Guest starring LeVar Burton

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay cant believe his luck when he gets out of a shopping trip - until he receives a visit from ex-wife Dede, the last person he was expecting to see on his doorstep. Knowing how much trouble she can cause, he is keen to get rid of her as soon as possible - especially as she is yet to find out about Glorias pregnancy. Meanwhile, Phil and Claire need Mitchs legal help when Haley is arrested for under-age drinking. American comedy, starring Ed ONeill, with a guest appearance from Shelley Long

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Cam and Mitch spring a surprise on Jay and Gloria, while Phil misunderstands the situation when he makes a new friend. American comedy, guest starring Matthew Broderick, with Ed ONeill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Howard plan respective birthday celebrations for Amy and Halley. A letter from his brother makes Leonard feel anxious about his own lack of accomplishments. The series takes a mid-season break until the new year.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy subject their friends to a series of secret tests to find out who is most qualified to act as best man and maid of honour at their wedding. Penny realises her true feelings about her friendship with Amy

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Sheldon kicks Amy out of the apartment so that he can have some alone time to work, she and Leonard bond during a series of science experiments. Bert the geologist replaces Howard in his band Footprints on the Moon, and Sheldon finds Penny to be a surprising source of scientific inspiration. Laurie Metcalf and Brian Posehn guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj finds himself in the middle of a domestic drama when he realises that the woman hes dating, Nell, has a husband, Oliver, who is very upset about their new relationship. Sheldon rents his old room back to have a quiet place to work and drives Leonard crazy by being a model tenant

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: A prank goes disastrously wrong, destroying a crucial piece of evidence, leaving the officers trying to solve the mystery - with the help of visiting detective Frank Dillman. Guest starring JK Simmons

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake and his father deal with unsettled family business. Amy and Rosa work a high-profile case. Terry wants to join the NYPD band

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa refuses to apologise for insulting Miss Hoover, but she comes to learn about her teachers private pain

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: A Springfield Summer Christmas for Christmas
programme.desc: Despite disliking festive movies, producer Mary Tannenbaum comes to shoot a Christmas film in Springfield, and Lisa decides to make a behind-the-scenes documentary when Mary stays with her family. Skinner falls in love with the new arrival, but will Tannenbaum choose her fiance instead?

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The couples gather for their sixth dinner party, and while one groom cant wait to share his romantic realisation, others have less cause to celebrate

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is caught between a rock and a hard place when he is made responsible for distributing extra grant money. Bernadette turns the back garden playhouse into a hideaway to escape from her husband and children

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A documentary film-maker visits Springfield to see how the towns residents are progressing, making Homer worry he will not be seen as a success. In an attempt to convince the director of his so-called achievements, he borrows Mr Burns summer mansion, but his cunning plan does not have the desired effect. With the voice of Eric Idle

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart is referred to a therapist who is affected so deeply by the experience that she too is soon in need of treatment. Lisa gets a job tutoring Cletuss hillbilly children - and accidentally turns them into famous singers managed by Krusty and composer Stephen Sondheim. With the guest voices of Sondheim, Meg Ryan and Peter Bogdanovich

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer makes a connection with Bart after being hypnotised into thinking he is a 10-year-old boy by hypnotist Svenjamin Ghali, leading to the pair embarking on a series of mischievous adventures. Animated comedy capers with the family, in a story penned by Hollywood writer and producer Judd Apatow

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine with Me
programme.sub-title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine With Me
programme.desc: On night four, Anya Lawrence, who plays Vicky Grant, hosts with a Greek theme. However, the main course proves controversial for one of the guests

programme.title: Supercruising: Life at Sea
programme.desc: The MS Nieuw Statendam drops anchor at the private island of Half Moon Cay in the Bahamas. Its a chance for British cruise and travel director Clare and her boyfriend, electrical engineer Andrew, to grab some much-needed respite on one of the worlds most beautiful beaches. Meanwhile, back on board, food and beverage director Mehmet ensures hes ordered enough food and drink to keep his passengers happy and fleet executive chef Sinu lifts the lid on some culinary secrets, teaching passengers how some of the ships key dishes are rustled up

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Hairdresser Ben sits down for a meal with sales manager Daisy, but romance hangs in the balance when his eye wanders from his date to a pretty waitress, getting him into deep water. Fantasy fiction writer and self-confessed geek Sarah returns for a sequel after her last date went pear-shaped. and is matched with bookies manager Nick

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Married couple Abbie and Charlie join host Anna Richardson and feature as the first picker pair as they search for another woman to join their relationship. Plus 41 year-old actor and glamour puss Chrissie from Leeds is hoping to find husband number four

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire celebrate Valentines Day a little early with their traditional role-play, meaning the return of Clive and Julianna. But all romantic plans are put on hold when an unexpected turn lands Claire in hospital. Meanwhile, Jays attempt to spend some time alone with Gloria is interrupted by a series of distractions, while Cam and Mitch throw a party for all their single friends - only to end up with shocking hangovers and a new room-mate

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch and Cams girlfriend Sal turns up with big news for the pair - shes getting married. How can they persuade her shes not ready to settle down? programme.desc: The family goes away to Marges favourite childhood holiday destination, which has unfortunately changed since she was last there. Homer spurs the locals into sprucing the place up, but an exuberant firework display wrecks everything, forcing him to make amends by becoming a fisherman

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy are devastated after learning from a Russian paper that Super Asymmetry has already been discovered and disproved. Bernadette wants to beat Howard in a video game

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy and Sheldon are still feeling down about their theory being disproven, until an old VHS tape from Sheldons past inspires the couple not to give up

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes jealous when Amy gets attention in the media, Raj spots Anu talking to her ex-boyfriend, and Stuart is intimidated by the idea of moving in with Denise, all of which cause mayhem when Penny and Leonard organise a paintball game

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Gloria is forced to rally the family to Phils side when he is rushed to hospital for emergency surgery. Fred Willard and Fred Savage guest star in the 200th episode of the comedy

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Dave and Tina discover a common bond when they attend a concert together. Comedy, starring Cedric the Entertainer and Max Greenfield

programme.title: Modern Family

Phil and Claire try to make the most of their surroundings by trying out some rather adventurous excursions. Comedy, starring Ed ONeill

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire realise that Alex may be more self-sufficient than they give her credit for when they drop in for a quick visit to her college, while Manny is determined to avoid a long tearful goodbye after Gloria and Jay move him into his dorm. programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

The pair grew up working at their fathers eatery nearby, but when they opened their own business, they couldnt replicate his success, and they now blame their failure on everything from the weather to the tablecloths

programme.title: The Simpsons

Matters reach a head when Flanders suggests Mr Burns donate to charities - instead of the other way around. Meanwhile, Marge feels as though their marriage has lost its spark

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: An insurance payout sends the Simpsons on a trip to Denmark, where they hope to get free healthcare for Grampa, who needs a serious operation

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch and Cam join the campaign to save an old tree in the park, while Jay and Manny are way out of their depth when they attend a childrens Olympics-themed birthday party. Claire takes Gloria shopping - only to have a run-in with the supermarket manager

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Manny and Lukes baseball team makes it into a play-off game, so Claire and Cameron scramble to find a suitable location and decide to make over a rundown field. Meanwhile, Gloria tries bonding with her unborn baby by singing to it - prompting an unexpected reaction from Jay

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon petitions Wil Wheaton to allow him to appear on the new Professor Proton show, so the actor offers a guest appearance to Amy instead. Meanwhile, Penny gets angry when she thinks the female protagonist in Leonards novel is based on her

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadettes friends each try different tactics to help her go into labour. Howard isnt happy when he finds out that Bernadette has already chosen their sons name without his input

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: While Leonard jumps through hoops to help secure the perfect wedding venue for Sheldon and Amy, Howard and Bernadette have a difficult time deciding which one of them should stay at home with the kids and who should return to work

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Pennys former boyfriend Zack and his wife encounter fertility problems when wanting a baby, so ask Leonard for his help. Raj attempts to patch things up with his estranged fiancee Anu

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy are thrilled when their super-asymmetry theory is proved correct by two physicists from Chicago - until the experts try to exclude Amy from their Nobel Prize nomination. Bernadette experiences a big success at work and plans for Penny to become a part of it - whether she wants to or not

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is excited to help Howard and Bernadette navigate some bureaucratic paperwork, until he discovers that they are breaking the law, leaving him with a difficult choice between following the rules or staying loyal to his friends. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny tries to put a stop to Leonards plan to be a sperm donor for her ex-boyfriend Zacks wife. Howard, Bernadette, Anu and Raj make the most of the latters cancelled stag party

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Musk Who Fell to Earth

Catching up with old friends, Simon discovers how one of his programmes help protect a crucial whale sanctuary off the coast of Australia

programme.title: Incredible Journeys with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: A look at the challenge of preserving unspoilt wildernesses, from the icy expanses of Siberia to the tropical forests of central and South America. Simon reflects on how his past series have dealt with the causes and impact of climate change, as well as remembering a memorable report exposing the extent of plastic pollution in the ocean. He also recalls meeting indigenous people around the world and hearing their first-hand experiences of ecological damage

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: The discovery of a wreck off the coast of Florida sends a team of underwater explorers on a mission to discover the identity of a ship that simply shouldnt exist

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: In 1925 the SS Cotopaxi carrying coal and 32 men vanished. It has since become synonymous with one of the oceans greatest mysteries - the Bermuda Triangle

programme.title: The Two Ronnies

programme.title: Siege at Red River
programme.desc: Confederate agent James Farraday steals a Gatling gun prototype from the Yankees. But smuggling it south through enemy territory proves more difficult, especially with detective Frank Kelso on his back, treacherous scout Brett Manning double-crossing him, and nurse Nora Curtis to protect. Western, starring Van Johnson, Jeff Morrow and Joanne Dru

programme.title: The Enemy Below
programme.desc: The captain of an American destroyer in the South Atlantic is still recovering from the sinking of his previous vessel. He tries to outwit a cunning German U-boat commander, but comes to respect the courage of his enemy. However, his crew fears he is not up to the challenge of defeating his opponent. Second World War thriller, starring Robert Mitchum, Curt Jurgens, Theodore Bikel and David Hedison

programme.title: The Colditz Story
programme.desc: A medieval castle in Germany is turned into a PoW camp during the Second World War, and used to house the most rebellious Allied prisoners, all of whom have made repeated escape attempts. Although breaking out is supposedly impossible, the determined inmates refuse to be beaten and continue their bid for freedom. Second World War drama, starring John Mills and Eric Portman

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: Rancher Shep Horgan takes in injured drifter Jubal, and offers him a job. However, a jealous ranch hand takes a dislike to the new arrival, and tries to persuade Horgan that Jubal is having an affair with his wife. Western, starring Glenn Ford, Rod Steiger, Valerie French, Charles Bronson and Ernest Borgnine

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: A cabaret singer who once hid out in a convent is reunited with the nuns she befriended, who now need her help. She poses as a member of the order once more and joins the staff of a Catholic school threatened with closure, where she aims to make a success of the resident choir. Comedy sequel, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Najimy, Lauryn Hill, Maggie Smith and James Coburn

programme.title: Copshop
programme.desc: On the run from an assassin, a wily con artist devises a scheme to hide out inside a small-town police station. However, when the hitman turns up at the precinct, an unsuspecting rookie cop finds herself caught in the crosshairs. Thriller, starring Gerard Butler and Frank Grillo

programme.title: Alita: Battle Angel
programme.desc: In the 26th century, dismantled cyborg Alita is repaired by Dr Dyson Ido, a kindly technician with a dark secret. As she falls in love with local youth Hugo, the truth behind her mysterious past is eventually revealed. Director Robert Rodriguezs sci-fi adventure based on the manga comic, starring Rosa Salazar, Christoph Waltz and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Corpus Christi
programme.desc: When a 20-year-old criminal experiences a spiritual transformation after his release from prison, he decides to minister a small-town parish, which also offers an opportunity for the local community to begin the healing process after a tragedy that happened there. Drama, starring Bartosz Bielenia, Aleksandra Konieczna and Eliza Rycembel. In Polish

programme.title: The Man Between
programme.desc: A German racketeer risks his life to rescue a kidnapped British girl from communists in post-war Berlin and escort her back to safety - but is forced to make a tremendous sacrifice to ensure her survival. Drama, starring James Mason, Claire Bloom, Hildegarde Neff, Geoffrey Toone, Aribert Waescher and Ernst Schroeder

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: Police inspector George Gideon experiences an eventful days work. He learns one of his detectives has accepted bribes, goes on the trail of a murderous maniac and tracks a woman suspected of robbery. He also helps foil a bank heist and gets off on the wrong foot with an eager young constable. John Fords drama, starring Jack Hawkins, Dianne Foster, Anna Lee and Anna Massey

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: A prominent Victorian gentleman thinks he has got away with poisoning his wife, but his shrewd maid knows the sordid truth and uses it to blackmail him. As the killers social standing improves, he realises he has to get rid of the scheming servant once and for all, but his plans to dispose of her lead him into even more danger. Period thriller, with Stewart Granger, Jean Simmons and Bill Travers

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: A group of people gather at a country house where their supernatural stories become all too real for one of the guests, who realises theyre all part of his recurring nightmare. Horror anthology, starring Mervyn Johns, Michael Redgrave and Googie Withers

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the childrens books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman

programme.title: The Popes Exorcist
programme.desc: Father Gabriele Amorth, chief exorcist of the Vatican, investigates a rundown abbey in San Sebastian. The owner, Julia, claims her 12-year-old son Henry has been possessed by a demon. Local priest Father Esquibel is unprepared to tackle the profanity-spewing malevolence, so Amorth lends his years of experience to the case. Horror, starring Russell Crowe and Daniel Zovatto

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: A 17th-century sorcerer escapes execution by travelling forward in time to the 1980s, where he searches for a mystical book that will allow him to bring about the end of the world. However, a heroic witch hunter has pursued him through time intent on bringing his evil schemes to an end. Fantasy adventure, starring Julian Sands, Richard E Grant, Lori Singer and Kevin OBrien

programme.title: The Masque of the Red Death
programme.desc: A cruel prince, who immerses himself in the black arts and terrorises the peasantry, holds a masked ball at his castle, where his wealthy guests take refuge from the plague ravaging the countryside - but a mysterious red-robed figure lurks in the shadows. The late Roger Cormans adaptation of Edgar Allan Poes horror story, with Vincent Price, Jane Asher and Patrick Magee

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: A piano teacher (guest star George Costigan) remains suspiciously secretive about his past when brought in to casualty after collapsing outside the hospital. Matrons revelation about Susie cools Aluns interest in her, and Mike takes pity on a mother while he treats her son. Elsewhere, Jill delivers bad news to an elderly patient and the porters are forced to take industrial action in support of a colleague

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Louise admits to Terry that her date following her break-up with Jamie was a disaster and Jack is furious when Victoria goes missing on the day of her court appearance.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Matthew confronts Katie and demands to know whats happening with Perdy. Jonny suggests to Paul a date for their wedding and Ashley grows increasingly frustrated with Hilary.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Eileen and Steve arrive in Malta, where they end up having to share a room - and a bed. Back in Weatherfield, Casey continues to come between the Peacocks, while Leanne and Paul enjoy their most successful lunchtime so far.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Steve is confused when he wakes up next to Eileen, but perks up later when he meets sexy holiday-maker Shania - unaware she isnt all she seems. Back on the cobbles, the Peacocks realise the locals still suspect Claire of starting the fire.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Penhale decides to have a Police Open day to raise community awareness, but the only genuine visitor is an angry farmer who has had three of her sheep stolen. Meanwhile, Morwenna decides to take Al away for the weekend to try out Hannahs new glamping site, but the trip does not go well as Al accidently burns down the yurt. Elsewhere, James has started biting not only Louisa but other children at the nursery. Louisa speaks to Tina about it, but is surprised to find out Tina has spoken to their lecturer about it too

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: A train crash claims the life of an infant making Jill more determined than ever to support Carnegies plans for a premature baby unit at the hospital. Meanwhile, local farmer Sam Benson (guest star Jack Deam) causes concern with his erratic behaviour, and Stellas rapist requires life-saving surgery after being attacked by the father of another victim

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A mysterious visitor is suspected of involvement in the theft of a priceless Ming vase. Mike tries to discover the reason for Mertons visit to headquarters and Gina starts acting like Aidensfields answer to Mata Hari. Nostalgic drama, guest starring Leslie Grantham

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A man who has not been heard of in 20 years and was presumed dead suddenly makes an appearance in Aidensfield - and seems not to have aged a day - prompting Merton to cross swords with an old adversary. Meanwhile, Vernons attempts to bring a taste of France to North Yorkshire are swiftly ruined as a wine connoisseur dishes the dirt on Scripps vineyards

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Perdy snaps at Katie as the pressures of the surrogacy increase. Emily is unhappy about Jonny and Pauls plans for a church service and Lily arranges a drink with Doug.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Perdy and Gray are excited as Katie goes ahead with the insemination procedure. Rodney is convinced that Paul is having doubts about the wedding and Emily apologises to Jonny.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Steve and Eileen contemplate the state of their lives and promise theyll always be there for each other. Norris receives bad news, while Gail and Sarah prepare for the vicars visit.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Steve arrives home with Eileen and tries to convince Liz he is over Michelle, but his feelings are put to the test when she returns to the Street. DI Parks questions the witnesses to the fire again.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Abbeys eventful party, Mary is forced to answer a pressing question about her future, while Carson reveals surprisingly intimate details about his former life. Roses trip to the bright lights of London sees her risking the Crawleys reputation, and Gregson shares ambitious plans with Edith, taking their relationship to another level. Costume drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: It is the annual Portwenn versus Port Carran gig race and school gig festival, and this time Penhale is the umpire and Morwenna is the Portwenn team captain. However, Morwenna is forced to find a replacement rower when Eric dislocates his finger. Meanwhile, Mel Hendy goes to see Martin at the surgery worried about a rash that could be infectious, but she ends up opening up to him about her concerns over her husbands drinking. Elsewhere, Martin and Louisa arrive home to find Chris Parsons waiting for them

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike gets involved in the troubles of a newcomer and her unruly daughter, only to learn her dark past is about to catch up with her in the form of a ruthless reporter. Meanwhile, Vernon decides there is money to be made from goats milk. Jason Durr stars

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Nicholson delays his 21st-birthday celebrations to join Bellamy in pursuit of two armed and dangerous criminals, but takes one risk too many. Meanwhile, Vernon finds himself blowing his own trumpet after hiring out a brass band to Lord Ashfordly. Rural police drama, starring Ryan Early and Mark Jordon

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detective investigates the discovery of an unidentified teenage boys body in a coastal towns shipyard, who is revealed to be listed as a missing person, having absconded from the care of his support worker. Vera discovers that the quiet community where he was found is plagued by a serious drugs problem - despite the fact that the only known dealer in the area has turned his back on crime. The victim could be the answer to the mystery, but a wall of silence surrounds his death. Mark Addy guest stars

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Detective drama set in the 1950s about a vicar and a police inspector solving crimes in rural Cambridgeshire. DC Phil Wilkinson arrests Sidney on a charge of sexual assault made by Harding Redmond after reading entries in the diary of his teenage daughter Abigail, who has now gone missing, along with the journal itself. After being grilled by DCI Benson, Sidney sets out to prove his innocence and is joined in his investigation by Geordie. James Norton and Robson Green star

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Geordie calls on Sidney for help as he investigates the apparent suicide of a Cambridge lecturer, who was found dead after falling from the spire of Kings College Chapel. His wife and his star pupil, who used to partake in daredevil climbs of the college buildings alongside his mentor, are convinced he was too happy and content for it to be suicide. It appears to be a case of night climbing misadventure, until a student witness comes forward, leading Sidney and Geordie into a world of espionage and secrets. Detective drama, starring James Norton, Robson Green and Morven Christie

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. A killer starts dumping the bodies of homeless men in the financial district of Bradfield, leaving little for Tony to work on except the bizarre ritualistic nature of the crimes. Oxbridge graduate DI Andy Hall fills in for Alex when she suffers a family bereavement and Kevin moves into Tonys flat to offer police protection when it becomes clear a stalker has the clinical psychologist in his or her sights. Drama, starring Robson Green, with Mark Letheren and John Hopkins

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Pauls confession about his night with Gray causes Jonny to demand some details. Debbie tries to keep her new man a secret from her family and Lily opens up to Edna.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Michelle and Steve have a heart to heart, and its not long before their true feelings come to the fore. Cilla considers a new career and Norris decides to go to Angelas funeral.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Casey keeps tabs on the Peacock household from her car. Michelle tells Ryan about her relationship with Steve and Norris attends Angelas funeral.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Change is in the air at the Abbey as an exciting opportunity for Alfred creates tension between Ivy and Daisy. Isobel appeals to Violets sense of charity, but it doesnt come without a fight, while Branson considers a new future for himself and baby Sybbie. Raquel Cassidy (Teachers) joins the cast of the costume drama, with Matt Milne, Cara Theobold, Sophie McShera, Penelope Wilton, Maggie Smith and Allen Leech

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Martin prepares to face his hearing, but despite having closed the practice, he finds all his patients are trying to make appointments. An American tourist who visited Portwenn previously returns to the town, hoping to research her family tree. However, she also has a medical issue, and comes to the troubled doctor seeking his advice. Louisa goes to see Chris to find out how serious the situation is, while the townsfolk take steps to show Martin how much he is appreciated. Sigourney Weaver reprises her guest role from the previous series

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Sergeant Merton is suspended following allegations of theft made by a woman he was dating, but Mike believes he is innocent and sets about clearing his name. Meanwhile, Vernon becomes concerned about Bernies strange behaviour. Rural police drama, starring Duncan Bell, Jason Durr, Jan Francis and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: The bobbies of Aidensfield try to get to the bottom of a series of burglaries in which the culprit only steals certain valuable objects, including Tricias postcard collection. Meanwhile, Blaketon attempts to raise support for his local election campaign, with surprising results. Rural police drama, starring Jason Durr, Clare Calbraith and Derek Fowlds

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Members of the Midsomer-in-the-Marsh Ornithological Society fall out when Ralph Ford claims to have spotted a blue-crested hoopoe, meaning he wins the groups year-listing competition. However, their president Patrick Morgan says the rare species could never have been seen so far away from its native Uganda and brands him a cheat. The next day, Barnaby and Jones have a murder case on their hands when Patrick is found dead at the scene of the reported sighting. Guest starring Paul Nicholls and James Dreyfus

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: A young man sat alone in the church and covered in blood confesses to Sidney and Geordie that he attacked and killed his landlord. However, when the pair investigate further, they find the alleged victim alive and well with his family. Elsewhere, Margarets visits to the vicarage begin to leave Mrs Maguire irritated, Leonard is distracted by secretive trips to the cinema, and Geordie is compelled to deal with a surprising shoplifter. Drama set in the 1950s, starring James Norton and Robson Green

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: As the trial of local teenager Gary Bell approaches, Sidney and Geordie find themselves in disagreement regarding his guilt. Meanwhile, a man is convinced that his dead wife is haunting his home and stable yards, and implores Sidney to come to his estate and perform an exorcism for him. The vicar offers prayers and counsel, but when the man is found hanged in the exact same spot in which his wife died, Sidney and Geordie are united by a shared goal as they investigate his suicide. Drama set in the 1950s, starring James Norton and Robson Green

programme.title: Cracker
programme.sub-title: The Mad Woman in the Attic - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. First-ever episode of the acclaimed crime drama, starring Robbie Coltrane. Psychologist Eddie Fitz Fitzgerald tries to establish if a man suspected of murdering a woman on a train is genuinely suffering from amnesia, but his shambolic behaviour, which has already prompted wife Judith to leave him, fails to endear him to the detectives investigating the crime. Also starring Christopher Eccleston, Geraldine Somerville, Barbara Flynn and Adrian Dunbar

programme.title: Cracker
programme.sub-title: The Mad Woman in the Attic - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. Pressure mounts on psychologist Fitz as he tries to unravel the roots of the murder suspects amnesia by inviting him into his home - a decision that will not aid his efforts to persuade wife Judith to return. Drama, starring Robbie Coltrane and Christopher Eccleston, with Adrian Dunbar

programme.title: Bloody Tales of the Tower
programme.desc: Suzannah Lipscomb and Joe Crowley examine the evidence and report on the intrigues that led to three royal deaths, detailing the sometimes salacious accusations levelled at Anne Boleyn, Catherine Howard and Lady Arabella Seymour. Henry VIIIs chief minister Thomas Cromwell informed the monarch of gossip about Anne and court musician Mark Smeaton, but allegations at her public trial included adultery with five men, incest with her brother George and treason. Rumours of relationships with distant cousin Francis Dereham and Thomas Culpeper led to Catherine Howards execution, while Lady Arabella, a serious threat to the ruling Stuart dynasty, is thought to have committed suicide against a backdrop of a cross-dressing noblewoman and two escapes from the Tower

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Jay Blades and his team meet John and his daughter Jo who bring them a wooden automaton made 156 years ago by their much loved Uncle Bob while he was in enforced quarantine after contracting smallpox. Helen brings in a pair of ceramic doves for Kirsten to take under her wing. Originally bought in Vallauris, France by her grandfather, theyre thought to be based on the work of Picasso. One of the barns newest experts Angelina Bakalarou is tasked with fixing a mining helmet made from compressed paper used by a Welsh colliery worker during his 51-year career down the mines. programme.title: The Repair Shop

Wood expert Will Kirk is amazed when a First World War dominoes set, thought to have been played in the Christmas truce of 1914, arrives in the barn. programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell revisit three more memorable stories, including divorced couple Marion Williams and James McDonnell, who were reunited with the son they gave up for adoption as teenagers. programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Blacksmith conservator Matthew Boultwood takes on a piece of British military history - a ceremonial helmet from one of the oldest regiments in the army, the Life Guards. programme.title: A Place in the Sun

Now theyre in a position to buy their own holiday home and have chosen the area around Protaras in south east Cyprus. With a maximum budget of £70,000, theyre hoping property expert Scarlette Douglas can find them the perfect place

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell revisit more of the programmes most memorable searches, catching up with two people whose lives have been transformed. The second story has never been shown before and features twins who were separated as babies

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Diesel is a hearing dog for his teenage owner, Rayane, who is deaf. This means he doesnt hear everything. Diesel is trained to listen out for important sounds that Rayane might miss. Diesel is Rayanes ears. Together, theyre unstoppable! Diesel wakes up wondering where he is. Then, he remembers - hes on a camping trip with Rayane and his friends Grace and Karim. And Mums come too! Rayanes even made a dreamcatcher from sticks and leaves he found around the campsite. But now its time to go home, so theres lots they need to do. After a breakfast of boiled eggs and toast, Diesel helps Rayane brush his teeth. Its Diesels job to filter out all the other sounds at the campsite and let Rayane know when the timer goes off to let him know hes brushed for long enough. Then, while the humans pack up camp, making sure not to leave any litter behind, Diesel has to listen out for Dads text so they can all meet him at the car park. The campers excitedly carry their kit back to meet Dad. But Rayane has left his dreamcatcher behind! Can Diesel follow the trail of familiar sounds to help Rayane find the campsite again - and collect Rayanes missing dreamcatcher?

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Newfoundland Sylvie is a therapy dog with big soft cuddles who loves to help people when theyre worried. She and her owner Katrina visit all sorts of people every day, young and old. Its Sylvie and Katrinas day off, and theyre planning a special lunch at the park cafe. At the bus stop, they meet Dawn from the toy shop, who is worried that her bus is running late. But seeing Sylvie waiting calmly inspires Dawn to do the same. At the park, Katrina and Sylvie bump into Harry the baker, literally! Harry is worried too; his shop oven isnt working. Sylvie nuzzles him in support. Grateful for their help, Harry offers Sylvie and Katrina a cake. Then, they meet Pete the postie, who is helping his daughter Caitlin ride her balance bike for the first time. Katrina suggests that Sylvie walks alongside Caitlin as she finds her confidence. Before long, Caitlin is loving every moment. Katrina and Sylvie finally arrive at the park cafe, only to find that its closed. Sylvie summons her super heart and the friends theyve met along the way to comfort Katrina and to show her that when youre kind to others, theyre often kind to you in return.
