programme.title: Bad Nanny
programme.desc: The concluding part of the documentary reveals how fraudster Samantha Cookes deception reached new heights as she entered the lives of Lorraine, Lynn and Hillery, posing as a therapist for children with additional needs. Under the alias Lucy Fitzwilliams, she earned their trust seeking donations for a womens refuge. She then reinvented herself once more as a terminally ill author in Co Kerry, asking for money for surgery in LA. But when some of her victims discovered the truth thanks to a TikTok video, the vulnerable families banded together and turned detective to expose the truth, ultimately leading to Samanthas dramatic downfall and conviction in 2025

programme.title: Buddy Holly: Rave On
programme.desc: Rock n roll started with Elvis, but some believe that pop music started with Buddy Holly and the Crickets. As a songwriter, Holly revolutionised the genre by introducing dynamic new rhythms and unpredictable melodies beyond its traditional blues roots. In his songs written and recorded in the late 50s, it is already possible to hear the beat group sound of the 1960s, and beyond. This documentary tells the story of Hollys tragically short life and career through interviews with those who knew him and worked with him. Contributors include Don McLean, Paul Anka, Don Everly, Hank Marvin and Bob Harris

programme.title: The Iris Affair
programme.desc: Iris concocts an audacious plan to rescue Joy, involving a dramatic reunion with Cameron, then they are forced to flee with Alfie and Nico

programme.title: Sweetpea
programme.desc: Rhiannon is high on power and righteousness and goes after her next target, ultimate bully Julia Blenkingsopp

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Johnny Sack suspects Tony Blundetto was involved in the Joey Peeps hit, causing tension between him and the Soprano organisation. Meadow organises her boyfriends finances, but becomes frustrated by his lack of responsibility

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Hood sniffs out a stash of illegal weapons hidden in Proctors basement and arrests him, while Sharpe and his gang of neo-Nazi skinheads take revenge on Emmett. Job manages to find Mr Rabbits hiding place after analysing Racines computer files

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Robbs bannermen make a declaration that threatens to throw Westeros into disarray. Catelyn confronts Jaime Lannister about Brans near-fatal fall, Arya tries to flee the capital, and Tywin sends Tyrion on a surprising assignment. Jon Snow struggles to decide where his loyalties lie, and Daenerys tries to rebuild her life after a tragic event. Fantasy drama, starring Richard Madden and Michelle Fairley

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The seven kingdoms of Westeros prepare for all-out war as newly crowned King in the North Robb Stark marches south to avenge his father. Tyrion Lannister arrives in Kings Landing to curb the excesses of teenage tyrant Joffrey, and Stannis Baratheon, brother of the late King Robert, sets his sights on the Iron Throne. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire novels, starring Stephen Dillane, Richard Madden, Peter Dinklage and Jack Gleeson

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion turns his anger on Cersei for alienating Joffreys subjects in the wake of the capitals bloody purge, and Theon returns to the Iron Islands for first time in nine years, where he discovers his father Balon is planning to rebel against the crown once again. Arya shares a secret with her new friend Gendry while travelling north to the Wall, and Davos Seaworth recruits an ally who may prove useful in Stannis Baratheons naval invasion of Kings Landing

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor returns to explore more of the worlds most luxurious hotels and begins in Miamis South Beach, home to some of the most hedonistic and extravagant establishments in America. At the Fontainebleau, he meets a man with eye-opening stories about Frank Sinatras regular visits and gets a shock when he discovers how much it costs to hire a booth in the night club. Richard also gatecrashes swimwear fashion week at the Raleigh Hotel, where he speaks to the event manager about the many celebrity parties he has organised

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: In this edition the actor explores the luxury hotels of Hong Kong. Home to more skyscrapers than any other city, he first checks in to the Mandarin in the financial district, before experiencing the Four Seasons, the only hotel with two Michelin three-star resturants, as well as the timeless Peninsula in Kowloon, which even provides a Rolls-Royce airport taxi service. He ends his stay at the Ritz-Carlton, home to the worlds highest swimming pool

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming discovers more little-known facts on a journey between Smithfields and Spitalfields, two of Londons most famous markets. He begins with a fry-up breakfast before visiting the remains of a Roman amphitheatre and investigating a mysterious secret in a Liverpool Street hotel, as well as meeting former EastEnders star Larry Lamb (Archie Mitchell)

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Documentary following stately home owners who hire out their estates to earn extra income, and the clients who pay to use their properties for functions including stag parties, weddings and hunting trips. The programme explores how the reality of life in Britains grand houses is often less glamorous than it appears, as proprietors struggle to maintain crumbling buildings and pay utility bills, and examines the modern-day divide between domestic staff and their employers. Featuring life at Chillingham Castle, Maunsel House, Carlton Towers and Muncaster Castle

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: During an awkward lunch with her publisher, Julia is unexpectedly inspired by an offhand comment from a well-respected chef. Starring Sarah Lancashire and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: Despite an extraordinary run, Julia decides to make the season finale the series last, shocking the staff of WGBH and Paul. Starring Sarah Lancashire

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Bayliss and Pembleton face up to deep-rooted prejudices while investigating the murder of a gay philanthropist. Meanwhile, detectives Kellerman, Stivers and Lewis decide to confront Georgia Rae Mahoney about the video

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Lewis and Falsone investigate the baffling case of a man found lynched, while Pembleton is puzzled to see Bayliss flirting with Detective Ballard

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrions agenda in Slavers Bay sees him seeking a new, strange ally. In the North, Brienne goes on a mission, while in Braavos, Arya is given a chance to prove herself. Beyond the Wall, Bran makes progress with his mystical tuition, learning a great deal in the process. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Gwendoline Christie, Maisie Williams and Isaac Hempstead Wright

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: Elena achieves literary success but worries about neglecting her children. Despite rebuffed attempts to reconcile, her friend Lila discloses a shocking truth about Elenas lover Nino, forcing her to re-evaluate her choices. Return of the Italian drama, starring Alba Rohrwacher and Irene Maiorino

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: While butting heads with Simca over the cookbook, Julia takes inspiration from an exceptional meal. Avis escorts Russ to an eye-opening dinner party, while Judith clashes with Blanche, and Alice faces mounting pressure from the network.. Return of the drama, starring Sarah Lancashire and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: Disagreeing on several recipes, Julia and Simca suggest a culinary showdown for guests including James Beard at Hunters birthday, while newcomer Elaine undergoes scrutiny from her co-workers

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Georgia Rae Mahoney makes more enemies in the homicide squad, and pushes one of them too far. Dr Cox recounts an odd story

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part one of two. Ballard and Gharty investigate when a priest is stabbed to death in his own rectory, but allegations of sexual abuse complicate the case

programme.title: Game of Thrones

Tyrion Lannister arrives in Kings Landing to curb the excesses of teenage tyrant Joffrey, and Stannis Baratheon, brother of the late King Robert, sets his sights on the Iron Throne. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire novels, starring Stephen Dillane, Richard Madden, Peter Dinklage and Jack Gleeson

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion turns his anger on Cersei for alienating Joffreys subjects in the wake of the capitals bloody purge, and Theon returns to the Iron Islands for first time in nine years, where he discovers his father Balon is planning to rebel against the crown once again. Arya shares a secret with her new friend Gendry while travelling north to the Wall, and Davos Seaworth recruits an ally who may prove useful in Stannis Baratheons naval invasion of Kings Landing

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A cynical petty crook is inspired when he sees a freelance camera crew, and decides to go into business filming crime scenes and accidents, then selling the footage to news broadcasters. His determination to stay ahead of the competition leads him down a dark path as his methods become increasingly ruthless. Crime drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo and Bill Paxton

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Christopher and Tony Blundetto reflect on their painful memories as they dispose of a corpse, Janice takes anger management classes after attacking a mother at a soccer game, and the conflict between Tony and Johnny Sack intensifies

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: The Capaccios strike out at Sangue Blu as they set out to conquer Forcella. An isolated Enzo risks not only losing his turf, but also his mens loyalty. In Italian

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Having realised the cause of all of her misfortunes, Patrizia is finally forced to face up to a life-changing decision. In Italian

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Job encounters a none-too-saintly priest when he heads to New York to track down Mr Rabbit, and is knocked down by a car while trying to escape and rushed to hospital. Carrie drops a bombshell on Gordon, Alex vows to supply evidence to keep Proctor in prison, and Rebecca shows theres much more to her than meets the eye. Guest starring Julian Sands

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: What Is Dead May Never Die
programme.desc: Tyrion strengthens his position as Hand of the King with a risky gambit devised to identify the member of the small council in league with his sister Cersei, while at Winterfell, Maester Luwin tries to help Bran make sense of his dreams. Catelyn travels to the Stormlands to foster an alliance with the Baratheons, but King Renly, his new wife Margaery Tyrell and her brother Ser Loras have other plans. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: A former Marine sniper is coaxed back into action when government officials need his help to prevent an assassination attempt on the US president. However, the intended target is in fact an African archbishop, and the marksman is set up by double-crossing agents to take the fall, forcing him to go on the run as he fights to clear his name. Action thriller, with Mark Wahlberg, Michael Pena and Danny Glover

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution. After killing the street thug who was directly responsible for her death, he finds himself in the middle of a war with the dead mans brother, who is equally hell-bent on getting even. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis and Thomas Jane

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Environmental activists hijack an energy companys gala in Canary Wharf and take 300 hostages and an ex-soldier now working as a window cleaner tries to rescue them. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley and Clive Owen

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Married explorers Rick and Evelyn battle the newly resurrected mummy Imhotep and his ruthless partner, who have captured their son. The undead creature is heading for a confrontation with a legendary ancient warrior - with power over a magical army to be won. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo, Oded Fehr and Patricia Velasquez, with a brief appearance by Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago. Fantasy adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Naomie Harris and Malin Akerman

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lords opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: A former Marine sniper is coaxed back into action when government officials need his help to prevent an assassination attempt on the US president. However, the intended target is in fact an African archbishop, and the marksman is set up by double-crossing agents to take the fall, forcing him to go on the run as he fights to clear his name. Action thriller, with Mark Wahlberg, Michael Pena and Danny Glover

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: An ex-Marine enforcer must battle his conscience and code of honour when he is forced to work for the Mob. Action thriller directed by Jesse V Johnson, starring Bruce Willis, Olga Kurylenko, John Malkovich and Michael Rooker

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: An upper-class soldier and his fellow officer stationed at Rorkes Drift in 1879 discover they have been cut off after the destruction of the main British army column in the area. They must rally their small force of 140 men against the might of 4,000 Zulu warriors advancing on their position. Fact-based historical drama, starring Michael Caine, Stanley Baker, Jack Hawkins, Ulla Jacobsson, Nigel Green and Chief Buthelezi, with narration by Richard Burton

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-vampire possesses all the strengths inherent in bloodsuckers with none of their weaknesses, and is determined to wipe the monsters from the face of the Earth. However, he faces a deadly new threat in a renegade vampire who is close to decoding an ancient prophecy that will allow him to repopulate the world with his kind. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff and Kris Kristofferson

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: An upper-class soldier and his fellow officer stationed at Rorkes Drift in 1879 discover they have been cut off after the destruction of the main British army column in the area. programme.desc: An evil sorceress transports the Mystery, Inc. gang back to olden times full of brave knights, spell-casting wizards and fire-breathing dragons

programme.desc: When the young performers on a music contest show admit they have never heard of Angus Scattergood, Bodi is compelled to join the show to restore the Rock Legends good name. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Graham Hamilton and Eddie Izzard

programme.desc: Ambitious fish Oscar dreams of escaping his humdrum undersea life. His wish comes true when a gangster shark keen to escape a world of organised crime seeks his help in faking his own death. But Oscar soon finds himself out of his depth as his fearsome reputation gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Smith, Robert De Niro, Martin Scorsese, Renee Zellweger, Angelina Jolie and Jack Black

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold, a pair of elementary school pranksters, inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure based on the best-selling series of books, featuring the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms

programme.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: Five years after events of the first film, teenager Finn has rebuilt Bricksburg into a post-apocalyptic wasteland. When Emmet is plagued by a vision of an impending cataclysm, he and Lucy fight to protect their beloved city from invaders. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Chris Pratt, Elizabeth Banks and Will Arnett

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Magical beings from folklore, including Santa Claus, Jack Frost and the Easter Bunny, join forces to defeat the plans of an evil spirit, who intends to steal the dreams of children and use the power they grant him to dominate the world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chris Pine, Alec Baldwin, Hugh Jackman, Isla Fisher and Jude Law

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling koalas attempt to save his theatre with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates, while the finalists of the contest find that their lives will never be the same again. Animated comedy, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson, John C Reilly, Taron Egerton, Jennifer Saunders and Jennifer Hudson

Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: The feuding duo wind up in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a villain. They also try to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber. Animated adventure, with the voices of George Ackles and Sean Burgos

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.desc: Tom and Vini are mice who stow away on Noahs ark. They must use their musical talents to enter a competition and help maintain peace among the animals. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Rodrigo Santoro and Marcelo Adnet

When a mysterious arsonist starts burning down Broadway, New Yorks firemen begin vanishing. Georgias father is called out of retirement by the Mayor to lead the investigation into the disappearances. Desperate to help her father and save the city, Georgia disguises herself as a young man called Joe and joins a group of misfit firefighters trying to stop the arsonist. Animated adventure, with the voices of Olivia Cooke and Kenneth Branagh

However, they crash-land on the plains of Africa and find themselves face-to-face with their wild counterparts for the first time. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer and Jada Pinkett Smith

programme.desc: When a peaceful island is visited by mysterious green piggies, its up to Red, Bomb and Chuck, outcast flightless birds, to get to the bottom of the suspicious invaders. Animation, with the voices of Jason Sudeikis, Josh Gad, Danny McBride, Maya Rudolph and Bill Hader

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red joins forces with Leonards team as the flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their war to the next level. When a new threat emerges that puts both Bird and Pig Island in danger, Red, Chuck, Bomb and Mighty Eagle recruit Chucks sister Silver and team up with pigs Leonard, his assistant Courtney and techpig Garry to forge an unsteady truce and form an unlikely superteam to save their homes. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Peter Dinklage, Tiffany Haddish and Dove Cameron

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: Tom and Vini are mice who stow away on Noahs ark. They must use their musical talents to enter a competition and help maintain peace among the animals. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Rodrigo Santoro and Marcelo Adnet

programme.title: Rebellious
programme.desc: A princess is kidnapped by an evil sorcerer and her scholarly fiance must use his wits in an epic quest to find her, while she boldly challenges her captors and plots a daring escape. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Vanessa Johansson and Marc Thompson

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: Boog, Elliot and their pals team up to track down an elusive werewolf and prevent their forest from being intruded upon by hunter Shaw. Animation, with the voice of Will Townsend and Donny Lucas

Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell

programme.desc: Two Spanish conmen set off for South America on a quest to discover the legendary City of Gold, but soon find themselves in the enviable position of being worshipped as gods by the natives - much to the displeasure of a local priest. Animated musical adventure, with the voices of Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Rosie Perez, Armand Assante and Edward James Olmos, and featuring a soundtrack by Elton John

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: A writer struggling to complete the script for a movie about psychopathic killers turns to his criminal friends for advice. He ends up getting more than he bargained for when the small-time crooks kidnap a dog that belongs to a gangster, putting all their lives in danger. Comedy thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Sam Rockwell, Christopher Walken and Woody Harrelson

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: A lonely boy makes a wish at Christmas that his teddy bear will come to life, which is magically granted. The boy grows up to become a directionless slacker, with the foul-mouthed living toy still his inseparable friend - but his girlfriend thinks it is time for him to grow up. Comedy, starring Mark Wahlberg and Mila Kunis, directed by and featuring the voice of Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: The foul-mouthed talking teddy bear is horrified to discover that he counts as property according to the law. He and his human best friend hire a pot-smoking lawyer to help them fight a court case and get Ted legally recognised as a person. Comedy sequel, starring Mark Wahlberg and Amanda Seyfried, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two desk-bound incompetent cops live in the shadow of their more daring colleagues. However, when the heroes of the station are killed in a bizarre accident, the bumbling duo get the chance to prove their worth as they stumble across a tycoons illegal activities. Action comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Steve Coogan and Eva Mendes

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rivals in the bookshop business fall in love over the internet, unaware they know and dislike each other in the real world. While things remain frosty in person, the pairs anonymous online relationship continues to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Greg Kinnear, Parker Posey and Dabney Coleman.

programme.title: Jackass 2.5
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his foolhardy crew return for another instalment of the anarchic comedy series. The outrageous stunts performed by the group of friends include lying on a bed of nails accompanied by two snakes and riding motor bikes through a shopping mall. With Bam Margera, Steve-O and Chris Pontius

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Michael Douglas.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Two criminal brothers discover the orphanage where they were raised faces closure unless the nuns who run it can pay their tax bill, so the pair embark on an urgent mission to revive their old blues band to raise the money needed. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Aretha Franklin, James Brown, Ray Charles, Cab Calloway, Carrie Fisher, John Candy and John Lee Hooker

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An eccentric but brilliant former cop sets himself up to champion the underdog - as a private eye specialising in locating missing animals. The zany detective is called in to find a kidnapped dolphin - the mascot of an American football team - and uncovers a plot involving high-level police corruption. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Courteney Cox, Sean Young, Tone Loc and Noble Willingham

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A washed-up quarterback ends up in jail after a drunken night out, and is ordered by the warden to put together an American football team to take on the guards, with the help of a former college champ. Remake of 1974 comedy The Mean Machine, with Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Nelly and Burt Reynolds, who starred in the original

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Third movie based on the MTV comedy series, in which Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Ryan Dunn and the rest of the fearless team of pranksters embark on even more strange and disturbing stunts, which range from gluing themselves together, enraging dangerous animals and firing an occupied portable toilet from a catapult

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: More than a decade on from his appearance in documentary series The Office, a film crew is once again following the life of David Brent. He is now working as a rep for a cleaning-goods distributor, but harbours dreams of making it big in the music business. Acting on this, he takes three weeks off work and tours with a new-look version of Foregone Conclusion, the band he fronted in the 1990s. Mockumentary comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Ben Bailey Smith and Tom Basden.

programme.title: Escape from Alcatraz
programme.desc: A cunning convict with a history of making escape attempts is transferred to the notorious high-security island prison off the California coast, from which no one has ever broken out. Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A farmer in need of money agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train arrives to transport him to jail. Meanwhile, the pair are holed up in a hotel, where his prisoner plays mind games with him - and the villains cohorts are waiting outside ready to engineer an escape. Western adapted from a novel by Elmore Leonard, with Van Heflin, Glenn Ford, Felicia Farr and Leora Dana

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A jaded German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past as a member of a far-left radical group when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London. Drama, starring Jeroen Krabbe and Susannah York

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A mysterious gunfighter intervenes when a man and his family are threatened by a predatory cattle baron determined to force every homesteader in the valley off the land. The situation rapidly escalates into violence, while an unspoken attraction develops between the gunman and the settlers wife. Western, starring Alan Ladd, Jack Palance, Van Heflin and Jean Arthur. Based on the novel by Jack Schaefer

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppolas gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

programme.title: The Godfather Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michaels story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppolas Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale and Lee Strasberg

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his familys Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Francis Ford Coppolas crime drama sequel, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach and Bridget Fonda

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: When accountant Jonathan Mardukas skips bail after having been arrested for embezzlement, bounty hunter Jack Walsh is hired to catch the fraudster and return him from New York to Los Angeles. Unfortunately, his task is hindered by the ingenuity of Mardukas and the attentions of pursuing FBI agents and Mafia hitmen. Comedy thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, Dennis Farina, John Ashton and Joe Pantoliano

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A farmer in need of money agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train arrives to transport him to jail. Meanwhile, the pair are holed up in a hotel, where his prisoner plays mind games with him - and the villains cohorts are waiting outside ready to engineer an escape. Western adapted from a novel by Elmore Leonard, with Van Heflin, Glenn Ford, Felicia Farr and Leora Dana

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A jaded German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past as a member of a far-left radical group when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London. Drama, starring Jeroen Krabbe and Susannah York

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: A hard-boiled cavalry scout with a feral dog as companion stumbles across a woman and her child stranded on their homestead deep inside hostile territory. Despite repeated attacks by the Apaches, they refuse to leave their home, leaving the scout with no choice but to stay and defend her. Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris ODonnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part 2
programme.desc: A gang of foolhardy teenagers head for idyllic Crystal Lake with all manner of shenanigans in mind. But before they can get up to anything, a grotesque madman begins bumping them off in increasingly grisly fashion. Horror sequel, starring Amy Steel and John Furey and Warrington Gillette

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part III
programme.desc: Disfigured mass-murderer Jason Voorhees returns having survived a brutal attack and embarks on another blood-drenched killing spree around Crystal Lake. Horror sequel, starring Dana Kimmell, Paul Kratka, Tracie Savage, Jeffrey Rogers and Richard Brooker

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final shift, a burned-out paramedic has to train his keen but inexperienced replacement. What begins as a routine night soon descends into a chaotic, citywide odyssey that tests their endurance. Co-writer/director Christopher Leones action comedy, starring Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery and Aimee Carrero

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Hugh Grant, Leo Woodall and Colin Firth

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When a spy is suspected of treason, her husband faces the ultimate test - loyalty to his marriage or his country. Director Steven Soderberghs thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Cate Blanchett and Rege-Jean Page

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: After a young girl bursts into their home psychiatry practice claiming an entity is feeding on her, Jordan and her clairvoyant mother must find a way to stop the evil. Horror, starring Shawn Ashmore and Ashley Greene

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: Two buddies sneak into a party on New Years Eve 1999, but the night turns even crazier as the clock hits midnight. Director Kyle Mooneys teen horror comedy, starring Jaeden Martell, Rachel Zegler and Julian Dennison

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A billionaires death causes a bloody turn when an AI android built for human companionship goes haywire. Sci-fi horror, starring Jack Quaid, Sophie Thatcher Lukas Gage and Megan Suri

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: Two buddies sneak into a party on New Years Eve 1999, but the night turns even crazier as the clock hits midnight. Director Kyle Mooneys teen horror comedy, starring Jaeden Martell, Rachel Zegler and Julian Dennison

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: Two buddies sneak into a party on New Years Eve 1999, but the night turns even crazier as the clock hits midnight. Director Kyle Mooneys teen horror comedy, starring Jaeden Martell, Rachel Zegler and Julian Dennison

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: A fugitive is left for dead by his treacherous followers on a dangerous world full of lethal predators. He lures bounty hunters to the planet in the hope of killing them and stealing their spacecraft, but finds himself forced to work with them against an attack by the monsters at the top of the food chain. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Katee Sackhoff

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: The world is thrown into uproar when 12 alien spaceships arrive at locations around the globe. As tensions rise between nations and fear of the arrivals grows, a recently bereaved linguist is recruited by the US army to find a way to communicate with the aliens and discover why they have come. Sci-fi drama, starring Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Nasa astronauts Kira Foster and Christian Campbell travel to the International Space Station (ISS) on a Soyuz rocket to join American compatriot Commander Gordon Barrett. They will share the orbiting structure with three Russian cosmonauts. When Gordon receives information from Houston of military conflict with the Russians, the Americans are ordered to seize control of the facility. Drama, starring Ariana DeBose, Chris Messina and John Gallagher Jr

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Thirty young men and women are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is whats outside the ship or who theyre becoming inside it. Sci-fi thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Tye Sheridan and Lily-Rose Depp

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: On the desert planet Arrakis, freedom fighters Paul and Chani galvanise the Fremen to strike down murderous conspirators against the Atreides dynasty. Sci-fi drama based on Frank Herberts acclaimed novel, starring Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Austin Butler and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Two astronauts are left stranded in orbit above the Earth when the debris from an exploding satellite destroys their shuttle. Left drifting in space with no way to contact mission control, they begin a perilous journey to reach the safety of a space station before their oxygen supply runs out. Thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: The world is thrown into uproar when 12 alien spaceships arrive at locations around the globe. As tensions rise between nations and fear of the arrivals grows, a recently bereaved linguist is recruited by the US army to find a way to communicate with the aliens and discover why they have come. Sci-fi drama, starring Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: A fugitive is left for dead by his treacherous followers on a dangerous world full of lethal predators. He lures bounty hunters to the planet in the hope of killing them and stealing their spacecraft, but finds himself forced to work with them against an attack by the monsters at the top of the food chain. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Katee Sackhoff

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Nasa astronauts Kira Foster and Christian Campbell travel to the International Space Station (ISS) on a Soyuz rocket to join American compatriot Commander Gordon Barrett. They will share the orbiting structure with three Russian cosmonauts. When Gordon receives information from Houston of military conflict with the Russians, the Americans are ordered to seize control of the facility. Drama, starring Ariana DeBose, Chris Messina and John Gallagher Jr

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: A father and his two sons face off against terrifying creatures in a remote farmhouse. Director Benjamin Brewers dystopian horror thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Jaeden Martell and Maxwell Jenkins

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: A team of commandos enters a top-secret underground research facility when a deadly virus which turns victims into flesh-eating zombies is accidentally released. But their containment mission spins out of control as a rogue super-intelligent computer and hordes of the marauding undead wreak havoc. Sci-fi action horror, starring Milla Jovovich, Michelle Rodriguez and James Purefoy

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Zombie-fighting heroine Alice must battle her way through an entire city of the living dead in search of the scientist who created the zombie virus, in the hope of finding a way to stop it spreading further. Meanwhile, the corporation that employed him unleashes the product of its latest deadly genetic experiment on the city. Sci-fi horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich and Sienna Guillory

programme.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
programme.desc: Zombie-fighting heroine Alice comes out of hiding to protect a group of refugees in a post-apocalyptic wasteland overrun by the walking dead. Meanwhile, the sinister corporation that created the zombie virus is about to embark on its most dangerous experiment yet. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Oded Fehr and Ali Larter

programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Zombie-fighting heroine Alice roams the post-apocalyptic wasteland searching for human survivors. An encounter with an old friend leads her to a rumoured sanctuary in Los Angeles, but she discovers she has walked into a deadly trap and must once again battle the hordes of the living dead. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter and Wentworth Miller

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: Zombie fighter Alice finds herself trapped in a top-secret underground base as a virus sweeps the world, turning the human race into the undead. She battles through the complex in search of those responsible for the outbreak and faces an old friend, now under the control of her enemies. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory and Michelle Rodriguez

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: The sheriff of a quiet little town investigates a series of unexpected murders, trying to work out what could have driven seemingly normal, well-adjusted people to kill. He discovers that a toxic chemical has turned many of the townsfolk into bloodthirsty maniacs, leaving those unaffected battling for survival. Horror remake, with Timothy Olyphant and Radha Mitchell

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: The disappearance of an eight-year-old girl ties together a series of past deaths and disappearances, as well as bringing the truth about a broken familys history into the light. Thriller written and directed by Logan George and Celine Held, starring Dylan OBrien and Eliza Scanlen

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer is all set to leave the criminal world behind and start a new life abroad. However, his plans are thwarted when he is asked to track down a gangsters drug-addicted daughter and locate a stolen shipment of Ecstasy. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham and Sienna Miller

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Andersons historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A respected academic goes on the run when he is framed for the murder of a French historian. Pursued by the detective on the case and a sinister assassin monk, he strives to unmask the culprit, leading to a conspiracy determined to preserve a 2,000-year-old secret at any cost. Thriller based on Dan Browns novel, starring Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Paul Bettany and Jean Reno

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegass biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderberghs crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Three brothers run an underground bootlegging operation in Depression-era Virginia. However, as their criminal activities become increasingly successful, a corrupt deputy sheriff demands a cut of the profits, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood. Crime drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: An idealistic undercover cop in 1960s New York is ostracised by his fellow officers for his refusal to take bribes. Sickened by the widespread corruption in the force and the refusal of his superiors to do anything, he sets out to publicly expose the guilty parties, putting his own life on the line in the process. Fact-based drama directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Al Pacino and John Randolph

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Melancholia
programme.desc: A jaded German ex-pat living in London is confronted by his past as a member of a far-left radical group when hes asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer who is visiting London. Drama, starring Jeroen Krabbe and Susannah York

programme.title: Dead Shot
programme.desc: When a border ambush goes wrong, a retired Irish paramilitary witnesses the fatal shooting of his pregnant wife by an SAS officer. After outwitting the SAS, now wounded, and presumed dead, he escapes, taking his revenge to the dark and paranoid streets of 1970s London. Thriller, starring Aml Ameen, Colin Morgan, Mark Strong and Felicity Jones

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. Steven Soderberghs crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. Pope Pius XVI has died suddenly and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind involving a stolen canister of anti-matter. Ron Howard takes the reins once again for the sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer, Stellan Skarsgard and Pierfrancesco Favino

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

Director Asif Kapadia traces Amys rise and demise over the 13 years preceding her death, telling her story via her music and autobiographical song lyrics, video footage shot by friends and family, archive television clips, plus voiceover interviews with those who were personally and professionally close to her. Contributors include Pete Doherty, Mitch Winehouse, Tony Bennett, Mark Ronson and Tyler James

programme.title: Tina (2021)
programme.desc: Born Anna Mae Bullock in 1939, Tina Turner has sold in excess of 100 million records and earned numerous plaudits including Grammy awards and induction into the Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame with her first husband, Ike Turner. She was the first woman to grace the cover of Rolling Stone magazine and dabbled in acting including a memorable performance opposite Mel Gibson in Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome. Following a prolonged period of ill health, Turner intends to retire from the spotlight with her second husband, Erwin Bach. She bids farewell to her fans in the emotional documentary Tina. Directed by Dan Lindsay and TJ Martin, the film invites the singer to reminisce about her turbulent life and career with glowing contributions from friends, family and fans including Oprah Winfrey and Angela Bassett

programme.desc: Dan Jones explores the history of York Castle, built on the orders of William the Conqueror and once the regional seat of British government. programme.title: Live Tennis
programme.desc: The ATP Paris Masters. Coverage of day five of the ATP 1000 event, a hard-court tournament at Accor Arena, where the quarter-finals take place. Only one of the last-four matches 12 months ago went into a third set, with Holger Rune emerging with a 6-4, 4-6, 7-5 win over Alex de Minaur. Elsewhere, Frances Ugo Humbert followed up his spectacular triumph over Carlos Alcaraz with a 6-2, 7-6 victory over Jordan Thompson, while Alexander Zverev and Grigor Dimitrov also progressed to the semi-finals by beating Stefanos Tsitsipas and Karen Khachanov, respectively

programme.title: Live EFL
programme.desc: Wrexham v Coventry City (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the Championship match from StoK Racecourse. This is the first ever meeting between these two sides at this level and just the second in any competition since the turn of the century. The last fixture time these two teams met was back in January 2023 when Wrexham won a thrilling FA Cup tie 4-3, with the hosts scoring three goals in the first half to shock the Sky Blues

programme.desc: The Hotelplanner Tour Rolex Grand Final. Coverage of the second day of the end-of-season showpiece, which takes place at Club de Golf Alcanada in Mallorca, Spain. Previous winners of this competition include Marco Penge, Francesco Laporta and Marcus Helligkilde

programme.title: Live ICC Womens World Cup
programme.desc: Australia v India. Coverage of the second semi-final from Dr DY Patil Sports Academy, Navi Mumbai, as the teams for this years final are decided. At this stage of this tournament three years ago Australia hammered West Indies by 157 runs, while England beat India comprehensively by 137 runs to set up the third ODI World Cup final between the two countries

programme.title: Live Tennis
programme.desc: The Paris Masters. Coverage of day four of the ATP 1000 event, a hard-court tournament at Accor Arena, featuring the third-round matches. Great Britains Jack Draper saw his tournament come to an end at this stage 12 months ago, as he was defeated 5-7, 6-2, 6-3 by Australian Alex de Minaur, but by far the shock of the round was the elimination of Carlos Alcaraz, with the second seed also losing in three sets to number 15 seed Ugo Humbert, much to the delight of his home crowd.. Elsewhere, Holger Rune, Alexander Zverev, Stefanos Tsitsipas, and Grigor Dimitrov all safely navigated their way into the quarter-finals

programme.desc: Miami Dolphins v Baltimore Ravens (Kick-off 12.15am). Coverage of the week nine match at Hard Rock Stadium. Meetings between these two teams have been fairly even over the last five games with the hosts winning two of the last four meetings since 2019. However the last time these sides met ended in a thumping victory for the Ravens as they hammered the Dolphins 56-19 on New Years Eve 2023

programme.title: Live Tennis
programme.desc: The ATP Paris Masters. Coverage of day five of the ATP 1000 event, a hard-court tournament at Accor Arena, where the quarter-finals take place. Only one of the last-four matches 12 months ago went into a third set, with Holger Rune emerging with a 6-4, 4-6, 7-5 win over Alex de Minaur. Elsewhere, Frances Ugo Humbert followed up his spectacular triumph over Carlos Alcaraz with a 6-2, 7-6 victory over Jordan Thompson, while Alexander Zverev and Grigor Dimitrov also progressed to the semi-finals by beating Stefanos Tsitsipas and Karen Khachanov, respectively

programme.title: Live EFL
programme.desc: Wrexham v Coventry City (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the Championship match from StoK Racecourse. This is the first ever meeting between these two sides at this level and just the second in any competition since the turn of the century. The last fixture time these two teams met was back in January 2023 when Wrexham won a thrilling FA Cup tie 4-3, with the hosts scoring three goals in the first half to shock the Sky Blues

Eddie Moore and his son Cathal are working hard refurbishing their boat, waiting patiently to return home from Limerick. Chef, Aoife Ní Chiobháin discusses her constant search for fresh local fish, and long established Iasc Uí Chatháin, have a new project in the works

programme.title: Scoil Samhraidh Willie Clancy
programme.desc: Traditional music from Scoil Samhraidh Willie Clancy in July 2024, featuring entertaining performances and interesting conversation. The Willie Clancy Summer School represents all aspects of the tradition - the learners, the festival enthusiasts, the dancers, the singers, the discerning listeners, the young musicians and the professionals. This programme features music from Noel Hill, Liam O Connor, Tim Dennehy, Eimear Howley, the OLoughlin family and Andrew Caden

programme.title: The Far Country
programme.desc: A cowpoke is steering his cattle north to the Canadian border when a corrupt sheriff commandeers the herd. A local saloon-bar owner falls for the hapless cowboy, and with her help he recaptures his cattle. Hooking up with a wagon train, the couple head for the mining town of Dawson, but the thwarted and embittered sheriff is on their tail. Western, with James Stewart, Walter Brennan and Ruth Roman

programme.title: Into the Wind
programme.desc: The efforts of Terry Fox who, three years after having his right leg amputated above the knee, set out to raise funds for cancer research by running a marathons distance each day across Canada. In 143 days, he covered 3,339 miles, steadily capturing the heart of a nation with his marathon of hope and inspiring millions

programme.title: Paddy Devlin - Gunnadoir na Gaillimhe
programme.desc: Elayne Devlin explores why her uncle Paddy and nearly 70,000 other men from southern Ireland ignored Irish neutrality to fight for Britain. Teenager Paddy Devlin became one of the top snipers in the British Army, fought on D-Day and was seriously wounded in Germany. Men who joined up to fight the Nazis were given a warm welcome in Britain during the war, but Ireland was a cold house for them on their return. The huge involvement of Irishmen and women in the British war effort was ignored until recently. This documentary tells their story for the first time, through the eyes of one local hero

programme.title: No Tears

programme.title: Gadget Man
programme.desc: Another chance to see Richard Ayoade present a gadget-packed guide to the festive season, joined by techno-loving celebrity friends including Jonathan Ross, Stephen Merchant and Adam Hills to reveal new ways of doing the Christmas shopping, surviving the winter weather, cooking Christmas dinner and even wrapping gifts. Actor Reece Shearsmith helps test gizmos for dealing with snow, fog and long nights, comedian Robert Webb introduces technology that turns a smartphone into a breathalyser, as well as a pitch-shifting karaoke machine to improve carol singing, and actress Jessica Hynes assists one of Richards tasters for his festive feast

programme.title: Border Force: Americas Gatekeepers
programme.desc: Customs and Border Protection officers are stunned when they discover more than $2million of cocaine mixed in with gallons of household paint and bottles of beer

programme.title: Border Force: Americas Gatekeepers
programme.desc: Vigilant Customs and Border Protection officers uncover 5,000 rounds of ammunition being smuggled across Hidalgo Bridge into Mexico

programme.title: Cape Carnage: Killer Catch
programme.desc: The crew of the Wildcard push hard to hit their seasons 35-tonne break-even target, and a return to Cape Carnage results in a season-ending injury for one of the team

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Bob Mortimer, Kimberly Wyatt, Ross Noble and Jimi Mistry are among the celebrities hoping to raise money for charity as Sean Kelly opens more mystery storage containers. The host also welcomes Shaun Ryder and Bez, Jenny Eclair and Lizzie Roper, along with Jimmy Bullard and Carl Froch

programme.title: Celebrity Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Johnny Vegas, Nancy DellOlio, Tim Vine and Chris Kamara fight for the lots at auction

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad
programme.desc: Luke and his team are called to a farm in Donnybrook, Western Australia, where a 20-tonne excavator known as The Mud Monster is bogged. The owner was trying to build a recreational dam when the machine got stuck and it has been out of action for months now, burning money and holding up construction. Two other companies have failed to remove it and Team Salvage has just 24 hours and a 5,000 dollar budget to get it done

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May work on a project to build mobility scooters capable of tackling the British countrysides terrain. Ferraris four-wheel-drive FF is pitted against the revised, V8-engined Bentley Continental GT on a test track at the edge of the Arctic Circle, while James puts the Fisker Karma through its paces in Florida, and meets AC/DC frontman Brian Johnson

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May pay tribute to Saab, the Swedish car manufacturer that created several successful models since the late 1940s, but has now ceased production. Richard Hammond takes the passengers seat in a Skoda rally car that races a rocket-propelled flying man, and actor Matt Smith gets behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car. Jeremy also shreds the tyres of the noisy Maserati GranTurismo MC Stradale and the 510bhp Mercedes-Benz C63 AMG Black Series

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers celebrate British markets and the produce sold at them, making a rich walnut and fudge cake and preparing two seasonal soups. They also travel to Ludlow, Shropshire, to check out the stalls at a food festival and discuss the impact supermarkets have had on what people eat

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornish Christmas
programme.desc: Part one of two. The chef celebrates Christmas in his adopted county of Cornwall, exploring the music, food and drink of the region as he takes a break from his worldwide travel adventures. As well as joining in the ancient tradition of wassailing, he prepares a goose, tests out the ice rink at Eden and enjoys the singing of Port Isaacs Fishermans Friends

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Comedian Josh Widdicombe, presenter Gemma Cairney, auctioneer Raj Bisram and fashion designer Sophie Hermann join host Rob Brydon and regular captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show. As usual, the participants set out to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible fibs about themselves in a bid to secure a team victory, through rounds including Home Truths and Quick-fire Lies
